column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Thursday June 6 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR TATES CREEK RD / RUPTURED GAS MAIN:
column4: Outbound Tates Creek Rd is shutdown between Dove Run Rd and New Circle Rd due to a ruptured gas main.  All outbound traffic diverted to Dove Run Rd.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR TATES CREEK RD / RUPTURED GAS MAIN:
column4: Access to Kirklevington Dr from Tates Creek Rd is also shutdown due to related work in that area.
